page.title: 12FARMING AROUND WOODHALL SPA
page.content: Most of the land around Woodhall Spa is very flat and low lying.The land is some of the best in England for agriculture and there are a lot of farms in the area.In the past the land was not very well drained and it got very wet in poor weather.Farmers have dug drainage dykes around the fields to take away all of this water.Most of the farms grow crops such as grain and potatoes.Modern machinery such as tractors and combine harvesters are used nowadays and the flatness of the land is perfect for this type of farming.Few farms in the area have many animals although there are some herds of cattle.
